synopsis.text: After the end of the Fourth Shinobi World War, the Hidden Leaf Village entered an era of peace and prosperity under the leadership of the Seventh Hokage, Naruto Uzumaki. The village now resembles a modern metropolis filled with tall buildings and advanced technology. However, while the village has changed, the life of a shinobi is also beginning to change. Naruto's son Boruto Uzumaki has enrolled in the Ninja Academy, seeking to follow in his father's footsteps. Though born with great talent as a ninja prodigy, Boruto struggles with living in his legendary father's shadow. He strives to surpass his father to prove himself, which has strained their relationship. When a series of mysterious events begins to unfold in the village, it will be up to Boruto and a new generation of young ninja to handle these threats. Aided by the Seventh Hokage Naruto, Boruto's friends and teammates, his story is set to begin as he carves his own path to become a legendary ninja. Though peace reigns for now, sinister forces seem to be brewing that could threaten Boruto's carefree life and the safety of the village.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
